data.name: Sonic Origins - Premium Fun Pack
data.detailed_description: The Sonic Origins Premium Fun DLC Pack features Hard Missions, Letterbox Background, Bonus Character Animations in-menu & music player, and additional re-mastered music tracks.
data.about_the_game: The Sonic Origins Premium Fun DLC Pack features Hard Missions, Letterbox Background, Bonus Character Animations in-menu & music player, and additional re-mastered music tracks.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400, 3.1 GHz or AMD FX-8350, 4.2 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750, 2 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7790, 2 GB
  • Additional Notes: 720p @ 60 FPS
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570, 3.2 GHz or AMD Ryzen 3 1300X, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770, 2 GB or AMD Radeon R9 280, 3 GB
  • Additional Notes: 1080p @ 60FPS
